activities: GATX Corporation will use and otherwise process personally identifiable information from the EU and Switzerland about employees located in the EU and Switzerland for the purposes of annual compensation risk assessment; maintenance of employee directory and global email system; performance management; coordination of annual succession planning and talent management review; internal audits; maintenance of corporate insurance programs; workflow management, such as assigning, managing, and administering projects; compensation, including stock plan administration and compensation analysis; payroll processing; pension plan administration; succession planning; benefits and personnel administration; IT helpdesk and support services; and; monitoring and enforcing compliance with company policies and procedures.
corpofftitle1: Vice President and Chief Information Officer
eucountries: Austria, Germany, Poland, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
